Eigen Property¶

class EigenProperty.EigenProperty(dataset, **kwargs)[source]¶

Property that holds eigen propoerties (e.g., eigen vectors, eigen values)

Attributes

Methods

eigenValues¶
eigenVectors¶
getValues()[source]¶

Get a specific characteristic value of the property

Returns

value for each point

Return type

np.array

Warning

This function needs to be overwritten for each inheriting property. It is empty at the BaseProperty

Sets eigen values and eigen vectors into the EigenProperty object

Parameters
